Am curious on the current in-game status of a few characters, wanting to kn=
ow where they're at IC before trying to write up applications and such for =
them and to fit in the current background of the game!

Uhm, currently want=
ing to know current status of Megatron's Ducky, Blackarachnia, Starscream, =
and Waspinator.  What thier current allegiance is in the game, current body=
forms, and a general summary (if available) of their story arcs from previo=
us players or as NPC's so I could match it up in writing them up!

Thanks.
